data.description:
JOIN THE HOLOGRAPHIC REVOLUTION 

Whether it's for a casual chat or a professional meeting, HoloConnect offers an unparalleled communication experience. Download now, and step into a world where distances fade and connections strengthen. 

WHY HOLOCONNECT? 

Get Closer: Feel the presence of your loved ones or colleagues in lifelike 3D, making every interaction more intimate and effective than a standard video call. 

Device Agnostic: Experience the future of communication on Meta Oculus 3 device along with other devices in the same session. *  

Group Calls: Create or join rooms with up to 4 participants, perfect for family gatherings, brainstorming sessions, or virtual hangouts. 
 
GETTING STARTED IS EASY 

Download HoloConnect and sign up 
Create a private room for your call 
Invite your friends and loved ones to join 
Start your first holographic conversation and feel the future of communication 

WHAT'S NEW 

Stay tuned for updates and new features that will continue to transform how you communicate and connect with the world. 

*Camera mode is required to capture Holograms. Currently available on: 
- iPad Pro 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023 and 2024 
- iPhone 12 Pro, 12 Pro MAX, 13 Pro, 13 Pro Max, 14 Pro, 14 Pro Max, 15 Pro, 15 Pro Max 
- Windows Desktop Application with Microsoft Azure Kinect
